title: Add 30 new prompts and surface them in the Prompt Library

requirements.text: Add 30 new high-quality AI prompt records distributed across the existing backend prompt categories (#videoGeneration, #photoGeneration, #cgiAds, #marketing, #storytelling, #business, #socialMedia, #design) so they are persisted in canister state and returned by the existing prompt listing APIs (getAllPrompts, getPromptsByCategory). Each new prompt must include: title, description, fullText, tags, and correct values for isPopular/isNew/isPremium.

quotes: Add 30 more high-quality AI prompts across all categories. Make them visible in the prompt library.

acceptanceCriteria: A total of 30 new PromptRecord entries exist in canister state after deployment/upgrade (not requiring manual creation via the Admin UI).
New prompts are distributed across all existing categories: videoGeneration, photoGeneration, cgiAds, marketing, storytelling, business, socialMedia, design.
Each new prompt has non-empty title, description, fullText, and at least one tag.
New prompts have unique IDs and do not overwrite existing prompts; nextPromptId is updated so admin-added prompts continue with the next available ID.
Calling getAllPrompts returns the newly added prompts (subject to existing premium gating rules).
Calling getPromptsByCategory for each category returns the newly added prompts for that category (subject to existing premium gating rules).

requirements.text: Ensure the newly added prompts are visible in the existing Prompt Library UI by relying on the current fetch flow (useGetAllPrompts → PromptLibraryPage) without requiring manual admin creation steps.

quotes: Make them visible in the prompt library.

acceptanceCriteria: Prompt Library page shows an increased total count consistent with the additional prompts ("Discover {prompts.length}+ professional AI prompts").
The newly added prompts render as PromptCard entries in the Prompt Library list when filters allow them.
Category filtering in the Prompt Library surfaces the newly added prompts under their respective categories.

constraints: Backend changes must respect the single-actor architecture (all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo).

If state must be modified on upgrade to inject the new prompts into existing deployments, use the platform’s conditional migration approach via backend/migration.mo (do not require manual admin actions).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding new prompt categories beyond the existing set.
Changing prompt filtering/sorting behavior in the Prompt Library UI.
Adding new admin workflows or requiring admins to manually add the 30 prompts.
Changing premium gating rules or access control behavior beyond what is necessary to store and list the new prompts.
